A fast food observation
Top Article All 29 Articles
1 of 29 by Jenn Reed
Created on : May 02, 2011 Last Updated : December 03, 2011
Fast food is a term used to describe food that is sold in restaurants or stores with preheated or precooked 2 of 29 by Rex Trulove
Created on : October 29, 2008
Fast food has a few intended consequences, such as being cheap yet filling, but usually a lot more unintended
3 of 29 by Sam Smart
Created on : June 18, 2009 Last Updated : February 03, 2010
What comes to your mind when you hear the term "fast food"? Probably hamburgers, 4 of 29 by Rachel Howells
Created on : April 23, 2011
Observing the decaying process of a fast food meal is an exercise in cognitive dissonance. It is passed 5 of 29 by Ted Onulak
Created on : March 30, 2009 Last Updated : March 31, 2009
Even if you really love fast food, everyone agrees that it's not that good for you, either in terms 6 of 29 by Pam Berglund
Created on : January 08, 2008 Last Updated : July 28, 2010
I come in from a hard day of work. My stomach is growling and I haven't eaten in almost 10 hours - so 7 of 29 by Lisa H Warren
Created on : April 30, 2007 Last Updated : May 20, 2007
"Fast food" doesn't have to mean "the worst food you could eat". It is possible to stop by a fast-food 8 of 29 by Joyce D. Sinclair
Created on : July 01, 2009

Created on : January 05, 2010 Last Updated : January 06, 2010
I was just a young lad when my brother cam home on leave from the army. We lived in a small village 10 of 29 by Joan Inong
Created on : December 17, 2008
Fast food has always seemed too fast for me. This holds true whether the fast food comes from a national 11 of 29 by Das Govind
Created on : March 31, 2009 Last Updated : April 01, 2009
Fast food is the number one leading cause of obesity, heart disease and diabetes in first world countries 12 of 29 by Mark Feldt
Created on : June 29, 2010
Home cooking is usually my preference for a good meal but sometimes it is not always practical to have 13 of 29 by Melissa Miles McCarter
Created on : November 02, 2009 Last Updated : November 18, 2009
I am a fast foodist. I am ashamed to admit this elitist bent of mine. However, it is a fact. I am bigoted 14 of 29 by Michelle Harper Davies
Created on : February 02, 2008 Last Updated : September 05, 2011
Junk Food
It took all my strength to push open the heavy metal doors of the restaurant, but when I had 15 of 29 by M W
Created on : February 29, 2008 Last Updated : November 30, 2011
I grow nervous when I step into a fast food restaurant during bustling hours. The lines are long and 16 of 29 by Barry Williams
Created on : February 27, 2008
I like fast food. I like fast food because it is fast . I like fast food because it so full of tasty 17 of 29 by Catriana McClelland
Created on : January 19, 2008 Last Updated : May 03, 2011
I would just like to say a few things about fast-food drive-through etiquette.
Ten things you should 18 of 29 by Gordon Hamilton
Created on : June 12, 2007 Last Updated : January 01, 2010
As we all know, fast food has become a multi-national obsession in these past few decades. If one 19 of 29 by Jocy Bella
Created on : April 05, 2009 Last Updated : April 15, 2009
It's all a matter of convenience. The faster the food is prepared, the better. For me that happens way 20 of 29 by Janette Peel
Created on : May 09, 2009
Fast foods have become an integral part of our everyday eating experience. In our fast paced and hectic
